about_the_game:
SPEARS is a co-op caveman game where you will hunt, explore, and survive with your friends. Hunt ancient prehistoric creatures with weapons and tools crafted from your gathered materials. Explore an uncharted world filled with various biomes, unique locations, and dangerous fauna.

Do it all with your friends as your tribe struggles to survive and migrate to faraway lands, with the ultimate goal of hunting down the mythical MEGAs and "Settling Your Tribe". 

Hunt 🏹

The tribe will survive. To survive, it must be fed. Hunt a range of prehistoric animals, such as the docile Deer, for their meat to be used as food for the tribe, while defending your hunting party against the hostile fauna such as ferocious Wolves that hunt in packs, Monkeys that will steal your items, or the mighty Bear that will maul you if you come too close.

Craft ⚒️

Feel like your caveman ancestor discovering tools for the first time. Our unique crafting system works by letting you try to combine every item in the game to find combinations that make sense. Using the combined wit of your tribe, discover new technologies by trial and error... or steal them from another.

Migrate 🧗

Collect resources, and hunt down and collect the trophy of several Megafaunas (MEGAs) of the world to give your tribe the supplies it needs to migrate to a new biome. You will be facing beasts such as the mighty Mammoth, the ferociously fast Sabertooth, or the giant armored Glyptodon. Each inhabits a biome that will be filled with new resources, dangers, and possibilities.

Explore 🗺️

Explore a world full of unique places to discover and mysteries to uncover. Dense forests, deep lakes, misty mountains, dark caves and more all hold unique points of interest. Perhaps you’ll stumble upon a stone circle, a cave bear's den or a hidden camp. Interact with other tribes, both Homo Sapiens and other species. Do you dare leave the safety of your cave?

Adapt 🃏

Each day Wild Cards will be drawn that change the world around you and make sure no two days are the same. You will have to contend with disease, storms, weird happenings in the forest and much much more. Will you adapt or will your tribe perish?

How far can your tribe go?

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon/Stylized violence resulting in blood (which can be turned off by the player). Some items or world objects may depict detached limbs with no blood or gore. Damage indicator in-game features blood.

short_description: SPEARS is a co-op caveman game of hunting, exploration and survival. Your small tribe will have to hunt prehistoric creatures, discover new tools and explore a harsh primeval landscape full of unique and secret locations. Do all this and your tribe might just survive and migrate.
